author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [PSReadLine](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine) from 2.0.0-beta4 to 2.0.0-beta5.
Release notes *Sourced from [PSReadLine's releases](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/releases).* > ## Beta5 of PSReadLine 2.0 > ### v2.0.0-beta5 - 09/13/2019 > > You can get the `v2.0.0-beta5` version of the PSReadLine module from [PowerShell Gallery](https://www.powershellgallery.com/packages/PSReadLine/2.0.0-beta5). > This release includes the following bug fixes: > > * Handle the dead key on Windows properly ([#933](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/933), [#945](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/945)) > * Fix duplicate menu at end of buffer ([#937](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/937)) (Thanks [@​parkovski](https://github.com/parkovski)) > * Get Buffer Info as part of the Environment data in bug reporting ([#942](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/942)) > * Add API to detect if the screen reader is active ([#947](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/947)) > * Fix `ArgumentOutOfRangeException` thrown when changing color of the error prompt ([#967](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/967)) > * Fix the 'ArgumentOutOfRangeException' caused by top of the text being scrolled up-off the buffer ([#979](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/979)) > * Add the missing single curly quote and double curly quote to `IsSingleQuote` and `IsDoubleQuote` checks ([#985](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/985)) (Thanks [@​msftrncs](https://github.com/msftrncs)) > * Fix the color of operator token in the `ArgumentMode` in syntax highlighting ([#1003](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1003)) (Thanks [@​msftrncs](https://github.com/msftrncs)) > * Prioritize highlight of command names, prevent bleed from aligned nested tokens in syntax highlighting ([#989](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/989)) (Thanks [@​msftrncs](https://github.com/msftrncs)) > * Prevent 'ArgumentOutOfRangeException' when showing the tab completion menu ([#984](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/984)) (Thanks [@​msftrncs](https://github.com/msftrncs)) > * Make `PageUp/PageDown` and `CtrlPageUp/CtrlPageDown` windows only ([#1032](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1032)) > * Fix `UpArrow` when the cursor is at the end of a wrapped line in a multiple-line text ([#1028](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1028))
Commits - [`809c287`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/809c2872c08b464e325d58fbe4cfa97b11b3c129) Update ChangeLog and version for 2.0.0-beta5 release ([#1046](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1046)) - [`5afeced`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/5afeced01f9ad3d246aac5242939e519b571dc8c) Revert "Change the key binding 'Alt+D' to 'Alt+Shift+D' for the windows edit ... - [`7d779cf`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/7d779cfd355d34954d01351fc1bcaa803d8af511) Fix UpArrow when the cursor is at the end of a wrapped line in a multiple-lin... - [`9c25008`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/9c25008a954d7f830eb4ac393776d167829430c3) Fix the 'ArgumentOutOfRangeException' caused by top of the text being scrolle... - [`3f6975c`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/3f6975c1a010e5f9ac6fde8086d72c35f7b6f062) Change the key binding 'Alt+D' to 'Alt+Shift+D' for the windows edit mode ([#1](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1)... - [`e9533d1`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/e9533d13f57b928f320f9c7d2a16c5182d76aeeb) Update the version of psreadline on latest windows in README.md ([#1038](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1038)) - [`bc55d97`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/bc55d978598b4500219ab07798b6f407310aed80) Update `README.md` to cover the use of `PSReadLine` in PowerShell 6+ ([#1034](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1034)) - [`d6b120a`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/d6b120a99b1831a6d438b5bdcb6f0308c07edb30) Make PageUp/PageDown and CtrlPageUp/CtrlPageDown windows only ([#1032](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/issues/1032)) - [`76f9c4c`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/76f9c4ce92a0f5def0d8ae3c06c87e087fae5e6a) Prevent 'ArgumentOutOfRangeException' when showing the tab completion menu (#... - [`820f160`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/commit/820f1607d6edfca2a197c6ee2d1645aa336b6448) Prioritize highlight of command names, prevent bleed from aligned nested toke... - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/PowerShell/PSReadLine/compare/v2.0.0-beta4...v2.0.0-beta5)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=PSReadLine&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.0.0-beta4&new-version=2.0.0-beta5)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=PSReadLine&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=2.0.0-beta4&new-version=2.0.0-beta5) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.

comments.body:

title: Bump PSReadLine from 2.0.0-beta4 to 2.0.0-beta5 in /src/Modules
